summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle in the sum of Twenty-four Hundred Eighty-four and 40/100 Dollars ($2484.40), for the purpose of completing the improvement of Shelby Street et al., by grading and constructing concrete sidewalks, as authorized by Ordinance No. 19563, creating Local Improvement District No. 1895.
